key_risk_themes: ["High Technical Complexity in Core Features","Stringent HIPAA Compliance Requirements","Dependency on External & Uncontrolled Systems"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize and execute a proof-of-concept (PoC) for the DirectX rendering pipeline (RISK-001) to validate feasibility and performance.","Schedule a formal security design review for all PHI handling components (RISK-002), including encryption, logging, and anonymization.","Develop a comprehensive integration testing strategy for DICOM interoperability (RISK-004) using simulators to cover various vendor behaviors."]
